realExams.question: Are the questions similar to real exams?
realExams.answer: Yes. All SmartPrep questions are carefully designed to mirror the structure and difficulty of the national entrance exams, so there are no surprises on test day.

difference.question: How is SmartPrep different from other study apps?
difference.answer: Unlike generic quiz apps, SmartPrep is built specifically for Ethiopian entrance exams with AI feedback, detailed analytics, and localized content.

offline.question: Can I use SmartPrep offline?
offline.answer: Not yet, but we’re working on it! You currently need an internet connection to access the full experience.

contentCreators.question: Who creates the questions and study materials?
contentCreators.answer: Our content is created by experienced Ethiopian teachers and subject-matter experts who know the national curriculum.
